reasoning: Genetic disorder measured by prevalence. DM1 prevalence approximately 8 per 100k based on population studies. Most common adult-onset muscular dystrophy. Type 1 (CTG expansion) is more common than Type 2.
source: Theadom A et al. (2014). Prevalence of muscular dystrophies: a systematic literature review. Neuroepidemiology. 43(3-4):259-68
